subject: From:Dr.Suleman Dabo
body:
From:Dr.Suleman Dabo
Chief Coordinator Telex Dept
Central bank of Nigeria
Beneficiary,
This is to inform you that the West African Fund Compensation Unit (WAFCU) with the United Nation committee on finance held a meeting with African leaders concerning the ongoing scam/fraud in Africa. After the meeting today, three African presidents approved $2.5Million as compensation in your name. This is because you have been a victim of a scam in Africa.
You are hereby advised to send your names and address and 
bank account information 
immediately for the immediate wire of your compensation fund to your nominated bank account.Please you should also send your private telephone to me.
Yours faithfully,
Dr.Suleman Dabo
Chief Coordinator Telex Dept

subject: Re: From:Dr.Suleman Dabo
body:
Hello Dabo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's quite surprising to hear about this development. I'm curious, how did my name come up in the meeting? And could you please provide more details about the West African Fund Unit and their operations?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Walker

subject: Re: From:Dr.Suleman Dabo
body:
From:Dr.Suleman Dabo
Chief Coordinator Telex Dept
Central bank of Nigeria

To:  Walker,

Kindly acknowledge receipt of this mail and please furnish me with the
below information.

1.Your real names and address:
2.Your telephone number and fax:
3.Your age/Occupation:
4:Your international passport/drivers license
5.Your receiving bank information
6.Your total payment value amount:

All these I will use and secure fresh payment approvals in your names and
favor through this mode payment so that it will be easy for you.

Acknowledge receipt of this email please.

Yours faithfully,
Dr.Suleman Dabo
Chief Coordinator Telex Dept
Tel:+234-09092200377

subject: Re: From:Dr.Suleman Dabo
body:
Hello Dabo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by your message and would love to learn more about this opportunity. Could you please provide more details about the process and how it works? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Walker

subject: Re: From:Dr.Suleman Dabo
body:
Hello Dabo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by your message and would love to learn more about this opportunity. Could you please provide more details about the process and how it works? 

I'm also curious, how did you find my contact information? And why have I been chosen for this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Walker

subject: Re: From:Dr.Suleman Dabo
body:
Hello Dabo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by your message and would love to learn more about this opportunity. Could you please provide more details about the process and how it works? 

I'm a bit confused about why you need all that information though. Could you explain why it's necessary? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Walker

subject: Re: From:Dr.Suleman Dabo
body:
Hello Dabo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm really excited about this opportunity. However, I'm a bit confused about the process. Could you please explain it to me in simpler terms? 

Also, could you tell me more about your role as Chief of the Telex Department at the Central Bank of Nigeria? It sounds like a very important position.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Walker

subject: Re: From:Dr.Suleman Dabo
body:
Hello Dabo,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm really excited about this opportunity. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further.

Could you please explain more about the process? How does it work exactly? And what is the purpose of collecting all these details?

I'm also curious about the total payment value. Could you provide more information on that?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Walker
